title: Idriss Déby
summary: Idriss Déby Itno[lower-alpha 1] (18 June 1952 – 20 April 2021) was a Chadian politician, military officer, and head of the ruling Patriotic Salvation Movement, who was the president of Chad from 1990 until his death at the hands of militant forces when commanding troops on the front in 2021.[5]
